explains: adj. 工人阶级的；劳动阶级的

sentences.en: He came from an aspiring working-class background.
sentences.cn: 他出身于有抱负的工人阶级家庭。

sentences.en: The Warners were from a Jewish working-class background.
sentences.cn: 沃纳一家人是犹太工人阶级出身。

sentences.en: Old working-class areas of the city are being gentrified.
sentences.cn: 这个城市工人居住的老城区正在进行改造，以供较高阶层人士居住。
